abilityEffect.en: As long as Electivire is your Active Pokémon, whenever your opponent attaches an Energy card from his or her hand to 1 of his or her Pokémon, put 2 damage counters on that Pokémon.

effect.en: Discard all of your opponent's Pokémon Tool cards and Stadium cards in play. If you do, prevent all effects, including damage, done to Electivire during your opponent's next turn.
